activities:
Where appropriate and subject to client approval, Text 100 shares client services information internally to conduct global public relations campaigns.  	
Text 100 also collects, transfers, and uses employee data for purposes of employee benefits and services.  Benefits and services include evaluation of qualifications for employment, provision of employment benefits, reporting, performance management and training, budgeting and 	salary administration and workforce management, business contact directory, company network access and authentication.
eucountries: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources Data
